CALICE::CorrectPositionProcessor

virtual void checkSimRecRelation (LCEvent *evt)

Detailed Description

Processor that generates a collection of CalorimeterHits with corrected position.

processor parameters

steering file parameter name

description

CellDescriptionProcessorName

name of the CellDescriptionProcessor that provides position information

InputCollection

name of the collection that contains the CalorimeterHits to be corrected

OutputCollection

name of the collection that will contain the corrected CalorimeterHits

ScaleEnergy

scale factor for the energy of the hits

Author:
Benjamin.Lutz@desy.de
Version:
0.1
Date:
June 2009
